column6: THE MOST DANGEROUS GAME CONSLUSION The X-Men lead a desperate assault to rescue their kidnapped teammate. But is the initial object of the X-Men's rescue effort, Longshot, what he first seemed to be--or something much, much more?
column8: | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Wade von Grawbadger | penciller:Stuart Immonen | colorist:Justin Ponsor | writer:Brian K. Vaughan
